Mastering Change Management: Implementing Organizational Transformation


In today’s rapidly evolving business environment, change management is a critical skill for leaders, HR professionals, and managers. This course provides a structured, hands-on approach to organizational change, ensuring you can successfully plan, implement, and sustain business transformations.


By following Kotter’s Change Management Model and behavioral change strategies, this course equips you with practical tools to overcome resistance, engage employees, and embed change into corporate culture. Whether you are a Change Manager, HR professional, or business leader, you will develop the skills needed to lead successful transformations with confidence.


What You Will Learn:


Understand why change management is challenging and the common mistakes companies make

Implement Kotter’s 8-Step Change Model for structured transformation

Engage employees, build urgency, and create a change-ready culture

Leverage emotional intelligence to drive behavioral adaptation in change initiatives

Develop change strategies that align with business objectives

Utilize quick wins and reinforcement strategies to sustain long-term change

Implement Google’s CES Model to make change stick in corporate culture


Course Structure & Modules


Module 1: Why Change is Hard to Implement

• How employees and leaders perceive change

• Eight critical mistakes that derail change initiatives

• Impact of failed change efforts on business performance

• Key determinants of successful organizational change

• Kotter’s Change Management Model and how it drives transformation


Module 2: The 8 Steps of the Change Process

• Breaking large-scale change projects into manageable phases

• The role of managers and leaders in guiding employees through change

• Aligning organizational goals with change strategies


Module 3: Engaging Employees in Change

• Creating a sense of urgency for change within teams

• Reinforcing the need for change through communication and leadership

• The role of leadership in driving transformation

• Forming a change leadership team and defining responsibilities


Module 4: The Role of Emotions in Change

• Applying the Rider, Elephant, and Track Model to behavioral change

• Guiding rational thinking (Rider) during transformations

• Motivating employees (Elephant) to accept and support change

• Simplifying processes (Track) to remove barriers to adoption


Module 5: Developing a Change Strategy & Vision

• Crafting a compelling change vision that resonates with employees

• Promoting the vision internally to drive commitment

• Creating an environment that supports sustainable change

• Leveraging quick wins to reinforce momentum and trust in change initiatives


Module 6: Embedding Change into Company Culture

• Ensuring long-term adoption of new business processes and strategies

• Reinforcing change through company culture and leadership buy-in

• Google’s CES Model for Change Implementation and how it ensures sustainability

• Finalizing change initiatives and tracking long-term success

Why This Course Stands Out:


Practical Change Management Training – Focuses on real-world implementation of change strategies

Step-by-Step Change Frameworks – Covers Kotter’s Model, behavioral change methods, and Google’s CES approach

Hands-On Exercises & Assignments – Includes templates, checklists, and case studies

Comprehensive Learning Approach – Learn how to plan, execute, and sustain organizational change


Who Should Enroll?

  • Change Managers & Organizational Development Leaders

  • HR Professionals & Business Transformation Specialists

  • Project Managers Implementing Large-Scale Changes

  • CEOs, Executives, & Senior Leaders Managing Business Strategy

  • Consultants & Change Agents Leading Digital and Cultural Transformations

  • Enroll Today & Become a Change Management Expert!


Master organizational change frameworks, employee engagement strategies, and leadership-driven transformation techniques to drive business success.


This course provides a competitive edge by focusing on real-world applications, emotional intelligence in change, and leadership engagement, ensuring your ability to lead successful organizational transformations.


About the course:

Welcome to this In-Depth and Comprehensive Change Management Course!


In today’s fast-paced and ever-changing business environment, organizations must adapt to continuous transformations to stay competitive and relevant. Effective change management has become an essential skill for leaders, managers, and professionals across all sectors. This "Organization Change Management" course is tailored to provide you with the knowledge, strategies, and tools required to understand, plan, and implement successful organizational changes.


Discover the key to successful change delivery with this Organization Change Management course, carefully designed based on years of practical experience managing projects for industry leaders such as Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and more.


This Organization Change Management course is built on my extensive experience working with major global corporations, including Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and many others.


This Organization Change Management course delves into two major standards and methodologies: the Association of Change Management Professionals (ACMP) and ADKAR (developed by Prosci). This combination will provide you with the tools and knowledge needed to manage highly complex and large-scale change projects or initiatives with significant change components. If you aim to pursue certification in Change Management, this course will prepare you to pass the exams for both ACMP and PROSCI, enabling you to become a certified change management professional.


This Organization Change Management course is particularly beneficial for Project Managers, especially those holding PMI PMP certification. It will deepen your understanding of Change Management and its connection to Project Management, equipping you to excel in managing projects with substantial change elements. Additionally, it offers 12 PMI PDUs to support your certification maintenance.


This Organization Change Management course balances practical application with theoretical knowledge, following a logical progression of Change Management throughout the lifecycle of change project delivery.


A significant portion of this Organization Change Management course focuses on Analysis and Strategy for delivering change. Drawing from my experience, this aspect is typically executed in large, multinational corporations for complex change initiatives such as mergers, acquisitions, cultural transformations, or major reorganizations. These organizations often have a Global OCM (Organization Change Management Office) in place, as seen in companies like Oracle, SAP, Accenture, and Magna.


You will learn how to manage changes, assess the impact of change, and evaluate organizational readiness for change. From there, you will discover how to define a change strategy, create a Change Management Plan, and execute it effectively. You will gain a thorough understanding of these concepts and their application in major global corporations. As the course progresses, you will explore resistance management, sustainability of change, and the importance of engagement levels and types to ensure lasting and successful transformations. Mastering resistance management and sustainability is a critical differentiator between average and exceptional Change Managers.


Upon completing this Organization Change Management course, your perspective on changes and projects will shift toward a more strategic and forward-thinking approach. You will be able to see the bigger picture, anticipate future risks, and prevent issues that could jeopardize the success of change initiatives. Your insights and expertise will bring immediate value to your organization.


Additionally, you will learn how to raise awareness for change, foster desire for change, and secure support and commitment. You will also gain skills to build knowledge and ability within employees, ensuring their success post-change implementation.


This Organization Change Management course will distinguish you from average Change or Project Managers. By applying the tools and techniques learned here, you will become a highly valuable asset to your organization, enhancing your career advancement opportunities.


After completing the training and applying the knowledge to deliver several projects, you will likely advance to high-value strategic change initiatives or move into higher management roles, recognized as someone who consistently delivers value.


This Organization Change Management course is ideal for anyone responsible for driving change within organizations, including Change Managers, Project Managers, HR professionals, Team Leaders, Managers, and Senior Managers.


It is also perfect for those aspiring to become certified change management professionals through Prosci (ADKAR) or ACMP.


While some experience in managing change or projects is helpful, it is not mandatory, as all concepts are explained in detail. However, a basic understanding of project management theory is recommended.

courseDetails.title: Solving LeetCode's Top Interview Questions in Java [2025]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Expand your knowledge of problem solving and impress your coding interviewers.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome!

Hello everyone, and welcome to the course that will help you prepare for your coding interviews!


Specifically, we will be breaking down the problems of LeetCode's Top Interview Questions playlist. This playlist includes problems that are very commonly asked by interviewers from large tech companies such as Apple, Meta, Google, Uber, and many more! We will learn how to approach problems of all kinds, such as those consisting of Arrays, Strings, Linked Lists, Trees, Dynamic Programming, Design, Math, and general knowledge, while also learning useful concepts and tricks which will help when facing more difficult problems.


What is LeetCode?

Simply put, LeetCode is a large repository filled with interview questions asked by the top tech companies around the world (Google, Facebook, Amazon, and many more).

The main problem as a new user on LeetCode is that there are ENDLESS amounts of questions that you can find on there so you may not know which questions are the most common/beneficial to go over. This course's purpose is to provide a solution to this issue, as I go over the Top Inteview Questions recommended by LeetCode. If you are looking to ace your upcoming coding interview or even just to strengthen your problem solving skills, then look no further as you have found the one-stop-shop to become a problem solving machine.

Course Overview

For each problem in the playlist, I have a video dedicated to explaining the thought process in detail which will lead us to the most efficient solution, paired with a visual to aid in explaining the algorithm. After we understand the approach for the most efficient solution, I will translate the visual into Java code, breaking down every line as I code it. After the entire solution is implemented, we will analyze the time and space complexity of the solution.
targetAudiences: Developers looking to solidify their problem solving skills and ace their coding interviews

In the modern data-driven workplace, HR analytics plays a crucial role in transforming how businesses make strategic decisions about their workforce. The HR Analytics course is expertly designed to help HR professionals, managers, and business leaders harness the full potential of people analytics, gain actionable insights, and drive measurable business results.


In this hands-on program, you will learn how to apply advanced HR analytics tools and techniques to optimize your human resources strategy. From calculating essential HR metrics to building predictive models and creating powerful HR dashboards, this course provides the foundational skills and advanced insights necessary to elevate your organization’s human resources analytics practices.


What You’ll Learn:

• Foundations of HR Analytics: Understand the fundamentals of HR analytics and how to apply them for effective decision-making across human resource functions.

• HR Metrics and Reporting: Learn how to calculate and analyze key HR metrics such as turnover rates, employee retention, and recruitment efficiency.

• Advanced People Analytics Tools: Master cutting-edge HR analytics tools like Excel, Power BI, and data visualization platforms to present impactful HR data insights.

• Predictive HR Analytics Models: Build predictive models using machine learning (ML) and statistical techniques to forecast employee performance, retention, and engagement.

• Employee Lifetime Value (ELV) Analytics: Calculate and optimize Employee Lifetime Value to assess workforce return on investment (ROI) and improve talent management strategies.

• HR Dashboard Design: Create dynamic HR dashboards for real-time tracking and reporting of key human resource analytics data.

• Data-Driven Recruitment Analytics: Implement recruitment analytics to optimize the hiring process, from sourcing candidates to reducing time-to-hire.

• Employee Engagement and Performance Analytics: Measure employee engagement and productivity using proven HR analytics models for continuous improvement.

• Turnover and Retention Analytics: Identify patterns in employee turnover and develop data-driven retention strategies using advanced HR analytics techniques.

• HR Data Visualization: Design effective data visualizations for HR leadership to communicate insights clearly and effectively.

Who Should Enroll:

• HR Professionals looking to enhance their HR analytics skills and apply data-driven strategies for organizational growth.

• Managers and Team Leaders aiming to make more informed decisions using real-time HR data and metrics.

• HR Executives and Business Owners who want to build a competitive advantage through data-driven human resource strategies.

• Aspiring HR Analysts eager to gain expertise in predictive HR analytics models and human resources technology.

• Students or professionals transitioning to a career in HR analytics and people analytics.

Course Structure:

This comprehensive course offers 10 in-depth lessons that cover every critical aspect of HR analytics. Each session includes practical case studies, interactive assignments, and actionable insights to apply directly to real-world HR scenarios.

4. Employee Lifecycle Analytics

5. Advanced Recruitment Analytics

6. Predictive HR Analytics Models

7. Employee Performance Analytics

8. Turnover and Retention Metrics

9. Survey Data Analysis for HR

10. Strategic People Analytics for Business Impact

Why Choose This Course?

HR Automation and Digital HR: Transforming Human Resources with HRIS and Technology


Course Description:


In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, the integration of HR Information Systems (HRIS) and digital technologies into Human Resources (HR) is essential for enhancing efficiency, compliance, and strategic impact. The HR Automation and Digital HR course is meticulously designed to equip HR professionals with the skills to implement, manage, and optimize HRIS solutions while automating HR processes to streamline operations and free up valuable time for high-level strategic initiatives.


Led by industry expert Mike Pritula, this comprehensive program delves deep into various systems, including HR Information Systems (HRIS), Human Resource Management Systems (HRMS), Learning Management Systems (LMS), Talent Management Systems (TMS), and the use of HR chatbots to revolutionize HR functions and enhance organizational performance.

What You’ll Learn:

• Core HR Automation and HRIS Solutions:

Understand the fundamentals of HR automation and learn to implement core HR processes using HR Information Systems (HRIS) and HRMS platforms effectively. Explore how HRIS automates payroll, time tracking, leave management, and compliance reporting.

• Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) & Recruitment Automation:

Discover the role of ATS within the broader HRIS framework, including automation for recruitment analytics, sourcing, candidate evaluation, and onboarding workflows. Learn to integrate ATS with other HRIS modules for seamless recruitment operations.

• Performance Management Automation with HRIS Integration:

Implement tools for Objectives and Key Results (OKRs), 1:1 meetings, performance reviews, 360-degree feedback, and pulse surveys using an integrated HRIS platform for performance monitoring and reporting.

• Learning Management Systems (LMS) and Digital Training Platforms:

Explore digital learning strategies, select the best LMS solutions integrated with your existing HRIS framework, and create scalable online learning programs.

• Collaborative HRIS Tools for Team Management:

Leverage digital collaboration tools that integrate seamlessly with HRIS platforms, such as Slack, Confluence, Trello, and Asana, to optimize workflows and facilitate internal communication.

• HR Chatbots and AI-powered HRIS Modules:

Discover the integration of AI-driven chatbots within HRIS platforms to automate routine HR tasks such as employee queries, leave requests, and onboarding processes.

• Advanced HRIS Reporting and Analytics:

Learn how to use the analytics capabilities of HRIS to measure HR performance, generate data-driven insights, and improve HR decision-making through customized dashboards and reporting modules.

Who Should Enroll:

• HR Professionals aiming to deepen their expertise in HRIS and automate HR processes to boost operational efficiency.

• Talent Acquisition Specialists looking to streamline the recruitment process using ATS and integrated HRIS solutions.

• Learning and Development Managers eager to implement and manage digital learning using LMS integrated with HRIS.

• HR Managers and Directors seeking to leverage technology for improved collaboration, performance management, and HR compliance.

Course Structure:


The program consists of 7 comprehensive modules, with each lesson focusing on critical aspects of HRIS implementation, HR automation, and digital transformation. Lessons are released weekly, allowing learners to build their knowledge progressively through recorded classes, practical assignments, and real-world exercises.

3. Performance Management Automation with HRIS

• Enabling automated 1:1 meetings, continuous feedback, and OKRs

• Measuring productivity and engagement with HRIS analytics


4. Learning Management Systems (LMS) Integrated with HRIS

• Selection of LMS platforms that integrate seamlessly with existing HRIS

• Automating employee training pathways and certifications

• Tracking training effectiveness through HRIS analytics


5. Collaborative Tools Integrated with HRIS

• Utilizing platforms like Slack, Trello, and Asana for team collaboration

• Synchronizing tasks, schedules, and projects within your HRIS system

• Enhancing communication and productivity through digital HR workflows


6. HR Chatbots and AI in HRIS Solutions

• Implementing AI-powered chatbots for automating routine HR functions

• Use cases of AI in managing employee self-service portals within HRIS

• Enhancing candidate and employee experiences through automation


7. Advanced Reporting & HR Analytics with HRIS

• Customizing dashboards for HR reporting

• Real-time analytics to improve HR decisions and strategies

• Data visualization tools integrated within modern HRIS platforms

Why Choose This Course?

courseDetails.title: 3Bedrom Bungalow SketchUp from basic to advance Free version
courseDetails.shortDescription: 3Bedroom bungalow 3D SketchUp pro design from basic to advance level, (Free version)
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you're looking to design 3D models using SketchUp and you're interested in learning from basic to advanced levels, here’s a guide tailored for the free version of SketchUp:

Getting Started with SketchUp Free

  1. Introduction to SketchUp Free

    • What is SketchUp Free? It’s a browser-based version of SketchUp that’s accessible without cost. It’s ideal for basic 3D modeling tasks.

    • Basic Tools and Features

      • Navigate the Interface: Learn how to use the toolbar, the drawing area, and the default panels.

      • Basic Drawing: Start with basic shapes like rectangles, circles, and lines.

      • Push/Pull Tool: This tool helps you extrude 2D shapes into 3D models.

      • Move, Rotate, and Scale: Understand how to manipulate objects within your model.

    • Creating Simple Models

      • Build a Basic Object: Practice creating simple objects like a chair or table.

      • Group and Component: Learn to group objects to manage them easily and use components to reuse elements.

    Intermediate Skills

    1. Detailed Modeling

      • Precision Drawing: Use guidelines and inferencing to create accurate models.

      • Layers and Tags: Organize your model using layers (now called tags) for better management.

      • Textures and Materials: Apply textures and colors to your models for a more realistic look.

    2. Advanced Tools

      • Follow Me Tool: Create complex shapes by extruding a profile along a path.

      • Intersect Faces: Use this tool to create detailed cuts and intersections in your model.

      • Scale Tool: Learn advanced scaling techniques for fine-tuning your models.

    3. Component and Model Libraries

      • Using 3D Warehouse: Access and integrate models from SketchUp’s 3D Warehouse into your projects.

      • Creating Custom Components: Design and save your own components for reuse.

    Advanced Techniques

    1. Complex Geometry

      • Advanced Shapes: Model intricate geometry and complex structures.

      • Sculpting: Use tools to refine and sculpt your model for detailed designs.

    2. Rendering and Presentation

      • Styles and Shadows: Apply different styles and shadows to enhance the visual appeal of your models.
